header_code:
;*** Header Start ***
G21 ;Set units to be mm
G91 ;Relative Positioning
M17 ;Enable motors
;*** Header End ***
footer_code:
;*** Footer Start ***
M18 ;Disable Motors
;<Completed>
;*** Footer End ***
first_layer_lift_code:
;*** FirstLayer Lift Sequence Start ***
G1 X10.0 Z5.0 F10
G1 X-10.0 Z-4.95 F10
;*** FirstLayer Lift Sequence End ***
lift_code:
;*** Lift Sequence Start***
G1 X100.0 Z50.0 F50
G1 X-100.0 Z-49.5 F50
;*** Lift Sequence End ***
